text: @realDonaldTrump If we expand Medicaid to cover the uninsured who test positive for COVID-19 America will remember they got health insurance for TRUMP and will vote for 4 more years of TRUMP. Winning! @POTUS @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @IvankaTrump @CNN @FoxNews @WSJ @HuffPost @washingtonpost
